constraints.name: tv_stand_presence
constraints.description: Verifies that the scene contains at least one TV stand object

constraints.name: desk_presence
constraints.description: Verifies that the scene contains at least one desk object

constraints.name: chair_presence
constraints.description: Verifies that the scene contains at least one chair object

constraints.name: chair_desk_proximity
constraints.description: Ensures the chair is positioned close to the desk (within reasonable working distance, typically < 1.0m center-to-center) to facilitate working

constraints.name: chair_desk_facing
constraints.description: Verifies that the chair is oriented toward the desk (facing the desk workspace) so the user can comfortably work at the desk

constraints.name: desk_chair_clearance
constraints.description: Ensures there is adequate clearance between the desk and chair to allow the chair to be pulled out and used comfortably (typically 0.6-0.8m of space)

constraints.name: work_area_coherence
constraints.description: Verifies that the desk and chair form a coherent work area, meaning they should be positioned together and not scattered randomly across the room
